title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing three eyes on the face in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about three eyes on the face in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a person with three eyes. This means to me the power of seeing him in reality in relation to the monarch and the strength of his intense gaze. Likewise, seeing my friend with three eyes indicates guidance, repentance to God, good circumstances, and the end of all life’s conflicts. Seeing three eyes in a dream indicates Closeness to God Almighty, religion, vision, and repentance from all sins. Also, seeing an extra eye in a dream means insight and religion that the individual or viewer dreams of. Interpretation of a dream about three eyes on the face of a single womanIf an unmarried girl sees a person with three eyes in her dream, this indicates comfort The psychological feeling that she will feel in reality. Likewise, if she sees that her fiancé or lover has become three-eyed, this indicates a broad diet and a high status in the girl’s dream. Also, since her lover’s mother has become three-eyed, this means that she will ask for your hand in marriage From her son and your marriage soon. Interpretation of a dream about three eyes on the face of a married woman. If a married girl sees in her dream that she has three eyes, this indicates a lot of sustenance for her husband and herself. This vision also suggests broad livelihoods and joining a new job to give birth to a new baby, God willing. Also, If she sees her husband having three eyes in a dream, this indicates a high status and obedience to God Almighty. Dreaming in a dream that he has one eye and his wife has three eyes, this is a sign of problems and disagreements. Interpretation of a dream about three eyes on the face of a pregnant woman. If a pregnant woman sees that she has three eyes, this It indicates the difficulty of giving birth and the deformity of the fetus. This vision also indicates a malignant disease affecting the newborn and the pregnant mother, and she will recover from it, God willing. Also, seeing that a woman has one eye indicates shortness of breath in the chest that he will suffer. Interpretation of a dream about three eyes on a man’s face if he sees In a person’s dream, he wakes up with three eyes. This indicates the blueness and richness of much of what he sees in his dream, and God knows best. Likewise, seeing a married man with three eyes indicates that he has given birth to a new baby and the ease of his wife’s pregnancy, God willing. Whoever sees in his dream that there is a dead man with three eyes Eyes in a dream is a sign of the Saladin of that person. If one sees in a dream that a person has died and his eyes are blue, this is a sign of a secret that will be revealed to the Mullah. Interpretation of seeing the third eye in a dream If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that her eyes are bleeding, this is a vision of success and confrontation. Failure with strength and control. Also, seeing a pregnant woman bleeding from her eyes indicates bleeding during childbirth, the death of her fetus, and the difficulty of saving him and the child. Interpretation of a dream about a child with three eyes by Ibn SirinImam Ibn Sirin narrated seeing a child with three eyes in a dream, which means some problems that the dreamer is suffering from Also, in a pregnant woman’s dream, seeing a child with more than one eye in the dream is evidence that her birth will go through safely. If a woman dreams that she is giving birth to a child with three eyes, this means that she will get rid of her problems and fears. If you have a dream that you want to interpret, put it in a comment Below and the m team will

title: The best and most comprehensive interpretation books

preview.html: The best and most comprehensive interpretation book, interpretation of the Qur’an is a very great science that scholars have undertaken to facilitate the verses of the Holy Qur’an with it to help the public understand. God's word is true. The Messenger is the will and peace of God, or he means the hadiths of its members and followers, such that the scholars’ interpretation is not based on the plural, but rather they base their interpretation on the Qur’an and interpretation. . . In his interpretation of the verses of the Qur’an, he relied entirely on other verses of the Qur’an, and collected the sayings of our Messenger, may God bless him and grant him peace, and what we heard from the Companions. A comprehensive statement about the interpretation of the verses of the Qur’an by Imam Abu Jaafar al-Tabari. This book is considered one of the most famous books of interpretation of the famous saying. It is also The farthest and largest, and it is the first reference for commentators, as the interpreters reported in their interpretation. In his interpretation of the verses of the Qur’an, he relied entirely on other verses of the Qur’an, so he collected the sayings of our Messenger, the supplication of God, may God’s prayers and peace be upon him, and what we heard from the Companions. The best books of interpretation with the hypothesis He collected them and what the followers transmitted, as he paid attention to poetic sayings, grammatical rules, and citing the verse, then mentioned the Prophetic hadiths based on them. Then followed the words of admirers and comrades. The book Jami’ al-Bayan fi Tafsir of the verses of the Qur’an was distinguished by its large number of references to the Children of Israel. The Short Axis in the Interpretation of Ibn Atiyya’s Precious Book Dr. Muhammad Abd al-Haqq ibn Ghalib ibn Atiyya interpreted the Noble Qur’an on the basis of previous books of interpretation. His writings were easy and accurate at the same time. Ibn Attia is very interested in choosing easy and soft words and avoiding ambiguity. He also had sufficient knowledge of the rules of the Arabic language, its methods and rules. The best and most comprehensive books of interpretation based on the interpretation of the Holy Qur’an and the verses of the Holy Qur’an, the hadiths of the Messenger, and the hadiths of the companions and followers, but he refrained from mentioning the verses. The children of Israel in his book. He was critical of those who were mentioned in the books of commentators. Interpretation of the Holy Qur’an by Imam Al-Hafiz Ibn Kathir, the best and most comprehensive book of interpretation with interpretation, and one of the greatest books of commentators. In interpreting the Qur’an, he relied on the interpretation of the other verses, the hadiths of the Messenger, and the hadiths of his companions and followers. The matter was not entirely left to the Israelis. Download the language parameters. The best and most comprehensive books of interpretation by hypothesis. Al-Baghawi’s book is distinguished by ease and clarity. Revealing the facts of the shooting of Al-Zamakhshari. The most important feature of this book is that it is presented on In the form of a question and answer, which is easy for many people and whoever reads it, this book is easy to understand. Other books on interpretation of the Qur’an are similar. The best books of interpretation by hypothesis, compiled by Jawaher Al-Hasan in the interpretation of the Qur’an by Al-Thalabi. Al-Durr Al-Manthur in the interpretation of Al-Suyuti, The strangeness of the Qur’an and the fluctuations of Al-Furqan by Al-Nasbouri, Al-Bayan Al-Qurtub, Bahr Al-Ulum, Tafsir Al-Samarqandi, and at the end of this Through the previous lines, we provide you with important and comprehensive information about the above topic, which is the best and most comprehensive interpretation of the interpretation books, and we wish you dreams full of goodness and kindness. Happiness and we hope you like it.

title: Learn about the interpretation of coal in a dream according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Coal in a dream: Its interpretation does not bode well in most cases because of its black color and its association with fire, so most of those who see this dream wake up in a state of fear and extreme anxiety, but sometimes we find good interpretations of seeing coal in a dream according to the dream itself and according to the state of the deity.. Coal in Dreaming about seeing coal in a dream shows the ruler, and therefore the person who sees coal in a dream is the person who will find work next to the ruler and under his shadow, which will significantly change the course of his life for the better, and the vision indicates that the dreamer will obtain huge sums of money from three main parties. Including work, inheritance, or from relatives, and if the dreamer sees himself using coal for useful things such as cooking food, carpentry, or blacksmithing, then this is an indication of performing his work with mastery and success. Coal in a dream by Ibn Sirin, Ibn Sirin interpreted it as a sign of forbidden money that It is collected in ways that are contrary to God’s law and it is also seen that the dreamer means that the dreamer will face some problems with an influential person and will use his influence and power to harm people, and this dream is a warning that the dreamer does not deal with people in a spontaneous way, and that he must be careful in his dealings, and more clearly not It is necessary to set limits and points that the viewer sets for himself in his relationships with men, and in this way he will protect himself from the harm of every sinner. Coal in a dream by Ibn Shaheen Ibn Shaheen believes that the dream of coal does not bode well at all, as it shows that Satan is paving the way to the most hated path to the forbidden. On the dreamer, so this dream serves as a warning to the individual that he is rushing after him. Suspicious things. The dreamer may be a business owner or merchant who does not monitor God and His Messenger in their dealings. By accepting bribes and selling low-quality goods to people at the prices of high-quality goods, this is considered theft and fraud. If the dreamer is from the engineering professions or has knowledge of the art of architecture, then this dream indicates that he is one of those who bribe with the intention of allowing real estate owners to construct buildings in violation of the law of the state and this It helps to endanger the lives of the people who will live in these buildings, as the dreamer may be among those working in professions that God Almighty has forbidden, such as selling alcohol, drugs, weapons, and other illegal activities that anger the Lord. Dreaming of coal in a dream, interpretation of Imam Al-Sadiq. The Imam warns whoever sees coal in a dream. A dream about the occurrence of problems, injustice and disasters, in the case of burning coal in a dream, and if the dreamer sees that he is buying regular coal in a dream, this indicates earning illegal money and seeing coal in general or buying it portends the evil that will befall the dreamer and the lies and hypocrisy of those around him. Coal in A dream for a single woman: A dream about coal in an unmarried woman’s dream expresses her connection in the shortest period of time, and this connection ends with marriage to a good man who is distinguished by his good morals and good reputation, which is what many people attest to. If she sees coal ashes, this indicates that she is in trouble and will witness Falsely, and expresses love for Al-Bussi

title: Interpretation of seeing an elephant in a dream according to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing an elephant in a dream According to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation, the elephant is considered an animal that lives in forests and natural reserves, specifically in tropical regions, so you rarely see it in many countries far from this region. An elephant in a dream shows that the dreamer carries many worries and problems that make it difficult to complete his life in this life, and that his feelings and thoughts are intertwined and unstable. In this article, we will learn together about the interpretation of seeing an elephant in a dream according to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation. Interpretation of the dream of seeing an elephant in a dream, interpretation by Ibn Sirin. Sirin will guide you to learn about the interpretations of the meaning of an elephant in a dream, which the dreamer may be surprised by, but its connotations are hopeful, because it brings goodness and food. Ibn Sirin interprets drinking or milking an elephant’s milk as a great benefit and a great financial return for the pioneer. As for whoever sees a dead or slaughtered elephant in a place He knows it, so it indicates that the owner of that place or its ruler is the one who symbolizes the death of the owner of that house or the ruler in that city. As Ibn Sirin believes that whoever finds himself riding an elephant may meet in his life a strong person who tries to defeat him, but he will defeat him. Whoever sees himself In a dream, he is riding a huge elephant with a saddle, as well as obedience, then this symbolizes that the dreamer will marry a girl who has an old family, but if he is about to do a new trade or business and God Almighty will grant him success, and God knows best. Interpretation of the dream of seeing an elephant in a dreamIf one dreams of an elephant blocking his way or It threatens his life, as he is the one who falls ill or may die. Whoever dreams that he is speaking in a movie, this indicates that he will become in a position close to a sultan or an influential person. But if a person dreams that an elephant is chasing him and threatening his life, this symbolizes that the dreamer is threatened in his life by Before someone who has great influence. If a person sees that an elephant hits him with its trunk, this indicates that he will get the best food. Whoever dreams that an elephant obeys his command, this symbolizes that an angel will come to him and that he will have great influence. Interpretation of a dream about seeing an elephant in a dream for a woman MarriedIt is one of the things that heralds a married woman, who should feel happiness and bliss when she dreams of it, so let us get to know the meaning of a married woman’s dream in her dream of an elephant. Seeing a white elephant in a dream by Ibn Sirin means that the woman will give birth to a child. Seeing a pink elephant symbolizes love between Spouses, familiarity and friendliness, while the black elephant symbolizes abundance of money and livelihood. Likewise, we find that Ibn Sirin interpreted seeing an elephant in a dream as bringing luck, happiness and joy to her life and the life of her family, God willing. Seeing an elephant being killed in a dream symbolizes the occurrence of an illness for one of the family members. Fighting an elephant And killing it symbolizes the happy life of the couple. Finally, seeing a sleeping elephant symbolizes the happiness flying over this house. When seeing animals in general from natural dreams, we cannot confirm that they carry elements and influences related to real life, but they reflect part of the dreamer’s soul, thoughts, and things. Which controls his mind in the last period of his life.

title: Interpretation of seeing the Day of Arafat in a dream according to Al-Nabulsi and Ibn Sirin

preview.html: I like itFansSubscribedFans Interpretation of seeing the Day of Arafat in a dream According to Al-Nabulsi and Ibn Shirin, the Day of Arafat is one of the blessed days that represents joy for Muslims. Certainly anyone can see it, but it must have a specific interpretation that we will learn in the following lines. Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing the Day of Arafat in a dream. Ibn Sirin spoke about seeing the Day of Arafat in a dream as evidence of good news and praiseworthy things that may happen to the owner of that dream or vision. Also, seeing Mount Arafat in a dream could be good news for the dreamer that he will make a pilgrimage to the Sacred House of God, profit from his trade, recover from an illness he suffers from, or make up for it. religion. If he is in debt, or absent, or missing, or a relative, or re-establishing rapprochement between the two parties. Al-Nabulsi’s interpretation of the day of Arafah in a dream. Al-Nabulsi interpreted the dream on the day of Arafah in a dream as evidence of kindness, blessing, livelihood, celibate marriage, healing the sick, honoring one’s parents, charitable works, wealth for the poor, and paying off debts. For the debtor. Al-Nabulsi said: Whoever sees himself in a dream completing the pillars of Hajj and completing them on the Day of Arafat, this is evidence of his repentance, the uprightness of his religion, and his walking on the path of honesty and justice. The sincere intention of God Almighty in a dream also means abundance of money and wealth after poverty. Interpretation of the Day of Arafat in a dream for a single woman When an unmarried girl dreams of a mentor and a happy marriage on the Day of Arafat, such as seeing her kissing the Black Stone in a dream, this indicates marriage to a wealthy person who will meet a partner If a pregnant woman sees herself in a dream on the Day of Arafat, this indicates that her child will be Good character and religion, and seeing a pregnant woman on the day of Arafat means that she will give birth. The male child in religious sciences and jurisprudence in general.

title: Interpretation of a dream about entering Paradise in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing entering heaven in a dream When you dream of heaven and its entrance, it often feels like a dream with meaning and clues. These dreams about fate and outcome are interesting to most who can see them and feel that they have a message or a sign. Read also: Penguin in a dream Interpretation of seeing entering heaven in a dream Interpretation of seeing entering heaven in a dream Some commentators say that seeing the entrance to heaven indicates the approaching time and date of death. But others interpret this as something good for the dreamer and a sign of happiness. Because when someone goes through a crisis or disaster and achieves what he wants, this is almost certain. If the dreamer enters heaven in a dream and he is happy, this indicates that he is righteous and does not disobey his Lord. Seeing him in heaven, the highest level in heaven, means that his financial situation will improve. title: What is the interpretation of dreaming of chicken in a dream?

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about chickens by Ibn SirinInterpretation of a dream about chickens in a dream: If he eats roasted, this indicates goodness and abundant nutrition. If one sees in a dream that he is eating raw chicken, this means that he overwhelms people and is very evil. If someone sees chickens in a group of eggs in a dream, this It indicates recovery from illness. See the chicken inside the home page. It is evidence of a prestigious position that the fortuneteller has reached. Dreaming of eating chicken in a dream, if it is boiled or fried, this indicates getting rid of worries and problems. Interpretation of seeing a chicken for Nabul: Seeing oneself eating chicken breasts in a dream is evidence of The prestigious position that the dreamer occupies in his field of work. Fried chicken in a dream indicates the abundance of food and great goodness that the dreamer will receive. If the dreamer sees that he is eating a chicken head, this indicates the loss of someone close to the dreamer. Interpretation of a dream about seeing chicken for a single womanIf an unmarried girl sees chicken in In a dream, this indicates marriage to a very wealthy man. Raw chicken in one’s dream is evidence of a failed connection. If he sees the slaughter of chickens in a dream, this indicates that he will get married without the knowledge of the family. Seeing the market Chicken is evidence of a new job that you will get. Seeing that you are getting Chicken eggs mean a lot of money that you will get. Interpretation of a dream about a chicken for a married woman. A married woman dreams that she is buying chicken from the market, this indicates a lot of money that she will get. A married woman dreams that she is cooking chicken, this indicates the happy married life that she lives. Slaughter Chickens in a dream indicate marital problems. Interpretation of seeing chickens for a pregnant woman. Seeing chickens in a pregnant woman’s dream is evidence of the birth of a woman. A chicken in a dream indicates the safety of this woman and the fetus. As for a dream of uncooked chicken, it is evidence of the problems that occur in it. Interpretation of a dream about chicks for a man: The dream A large chicken with a group of chicks indicates a major financial loss. If a man sees in a dream that he is trying to catch chickens, this indicates his desire to get money, but he finds it difficult. Add the dream that you would like to interpret with reference to the marital status in a comment below the article. We will answer it and explain it.

title: Interpretation of a dream about my sister hating me in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about my sister hating me in a dream. You, dear reader, can know the meaning of the interpretation of a dream about my sister hating me in a dream according to the interpretations of scholars and translators, not personal interpretations... Interpretation of a dream about my sister hating me in a dream. Interpretation of dreams that my sister hates me in a dream could be a sign of trouble, and God knows all the unseen. If she sees A married woman has a sister whom she hates in a dream. She can express a ruling, and God knows the unseen. If an unmarried girl sees her sister hating her in a dream, this may be a sign of crises and problems, and God knows the unseen. If a married man sees a sister who hates him, this may lead to crises and problems, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about my sister. You argue with me in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about my sister arguing with me in a dream. Perhaps it expresses disagreements, and God is All-Knowing. If the dreamer sees someone arguing with him in a dream, this may be a sign of pressure and problems, and God knows the unseen. Whereas a disagreement between two disagreements in a dream may represent reconciliation, and God is All-Knowing. An unmarried girl saw a quarrel with her sister in a dream, so that may be a sign of quarrels, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about seeing my sister sad in a dream. Interpretation of dreams when I see my sister sad in a dream, it may express some bad things, and God knows everything that we did not see, but seeing your sister sad in a dream It may indicate illness, and God knows the unseen. When a married man sees a sad sister in a dream, it can express bad friends, and God knows everything. If an unmarried girl sees a sad sister in a dream, this may indicate anxiety, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about my sister giving me shoes in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about my sister. She gave me shoes in a dream. We did not find specific interpretations to see. However, seeing someone I do not know give me shoes in a dream could be a sign of sustenance, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. If a married woman sees someone she does not know giving her her shoes, which may represent travel or work, and God knows the unseen. If he sees The dreamer is someone he knows giving him shoes. This may indicate support and support, and God has all knowledge. Interpretation of a dream about my pregnant sister in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about my pregnant sister in a dream about the money and goods that she receives, and God knows all the unseen. Where if an unmarried girl sees her sister pregnant in a dream, this may be kindness and sustenance, and God knows best. The unseen. If a single young man sees a pregnant sister in a dream, this may indicate a promotion at work, and God is Most High and Most Knowledgeable. Seeing a pregnant sister in a dream can represent an increase in nutrition, and God knows all that is unseen. Interpretation of a dream about my sister who loves my husband in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about my sister who loves my husband In a dream, it may indicate the husband’s preoccupation with worldly matters, and God knows the unseen, as the husband may express his concern for the world and his lack of interest in the path of truth, and God knows the unseen. If a married woman sees in a dream that the sister loves her husband, this may lead to disagreements with her husband, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. It may also indicate a relationship with her. The husband with his wife, and God knows best what he does not see. Interpretation of my sister Naima’s dream in a dream. Interpretation of my sister Naima’s dream in a dream. We did not find an interpretation

title: What is the interpretation of seeing a dead person in a dream while he is silent?

preview.html: If you want to know the interpretation of seeing the deceased in a dream while he is silent, we present to you through today's encyclopedia article the most prominent opinions expressed by scholars and sheikhs on this topic and what it indicates and the interpretation of this vision. We find that the dead person comes in a dream without uttering a word indicates different meanings and will be reviewed in the following lines, so follow us. What is the interpretation of seeing a dead person in a dream while he is silent? The deceased comes in a dream to convey a meaning to the owner of this vision, and of course it connects them to each other through kinship, and this silence in which the deceased is can have a positive connotation and can be negative. Ibn Sirin said several sayings about this vision according to the difference in the dream and the owner of the vision, so he said if the dead person comes to you while sitting next to you and does not speak, this is evidence of his need for charity and charity. Supplication. As for when the dead person comes silent, this indicates his desire to check on you in the event that you are not with him. We explain the rest of what Ibn Sirin said about this vision through the following lines: Interpretation of seeing a dead person in a dream while he is silent for married people If a married woman comes to her deceased husband, but he does not speak to her despite her efforts, this indicates the abundance of wealth and goodness that this lady will soon acquire, God willing. If a married woman sees that she is carrying in her arms a person who died in a dream, but he is actually alive, and she tried to make him speak but he remained silent, this means that this married woman will be exposed. For some things that cause her discomfort. Interpretation of seeing a dead person in a dream and he is silent for a single girl When a single girl sees a dead person trying to talk to him, and he does not answer or respond, this indicates that this girl will start something, but there is no good for her in it, which makes God end it. But if this girl sees that she will see the dead person alive in a dream, but she does not respond to anything, this indicates that this girl will make a mistake and must correct it as soon as possible. Interpretation of seeing a dead person in a dream and he is silent for divorcees In Ibn Sirin’s interpretation: When a divorced woman sees in a dream a man who cannot speak and is silent despite her great efforts, this indicates that this woman will see difficult things in her life, but she will get rid of them after that. And if the divorced woman sees that her ex-husband died in a dream, and he did not know how to talk to her, despite her attempts to speak but he did not accept, this indicates his long life and that he is in great danger. Difficult issues, but he will overcome them. Interpretation of seeing a dead person in a dream who is silent for a pregnant woman If the pregnant wife sees that she is feeding her husband and he has died and does not want to talk, this indicates many problems that this woman will face in life, but God will grant her success. Interpretation of seeing a dead person in a dream who is silent for young people Ibn Sirin interprets this dream and says that if a young man sees an old man dying in front of his eyes and wants to revive him and makes many attempts to help him but cannot, this means that he faces many problems in life, but God helps him escape from them. As for if the young man sees many children dying in front of him, and

title: Interpretation of a dream about menstrual blood in a dream for a single woman, a married woman, or a pregnant woman according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about menstrual blood in a dream for single and married women according to Ibn Sirin. Mahmoudiyah, which carries many omens for the dreamer, but in some different cases it can be a bad warning, and the interpretation of Al-Ahla depends on many details related to the dream, as well as the social status of the dreamer, in addition to his psychological state, and through this article we will learn about the interpretation of a dream about menstrual blood in a dream. For the single, the married, and the pregnant wife of Ibn Sirin, and all the interpretations related to it, it is one of the dreams that frequently search for signs and symbols that symbolize it when seen in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about menstrual blood for an unmarried woman according to Ibn Sirin. The great scholar Ibn Sirin is also considered one of the most famous scholars of interpretation, and because he interpreted many Different dreams have different explanations and interpretations, and among these dreams is the dream of seeing menstrual blood in a dream, and because it is safe. To be one of the visions that predicted good and abundant sustenance for the dreamer, so the dream depends on the details contained in the dream, the circumstances that followed the dream, and the social status of the dreamer. Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of a dream about menstrual blood in an unmarried girl’s dream is as follows: If an unmarried girl sees menstrual blood in a dream, this vision is an indication that she will soon receive a marriage proposal from this vision, and it will also be the appropriate offer for her to find. Happiness with him. This vision is also an indication that she has achieved many achievements in many areas of her life, so she is happy with what she has achieved in her life. Whereas if she sees menstrual blood at her time, this is an indication that the coming period of her life will be inspiring and filled with many achievements. Which you will achieve. See also: Interpretation of a dream about having a hole in the ear in a dream for a single, married, or pregnant woman. Interpretation of a dream about menstruation in a dream for an unmarried girl. A dream about menstruation in a dream for an unmarried girl is considered a praiseworthy dream, which indicates many positive interpretations and explanations, as it is based on Many of the details that we see in the dream, as well as the circumstances that accompanied this dream, and the most prominent interpretations of seeing a dream about menstruation in an unmarried girl’s dream are below: If a married woman’s dream is menstruation in her dream, then it is one of the visions that indicate her marriage in the near future to the person who will be her happiness. And he continues his life with her. Whereas if her vision of menstruation is black, then this vision is an indication that she will encounter many crises and problems in the near future that she will see this vision. But if her vision is of washing from menstruation, then this vision is a sign of her repentance from all the sins of her past life. See also: Interpretation of dreaming about a gift in a dream and its most important indications according to Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabul. Interpretation of a dream about seeing menstrual blood for a married woman. Interpretations of the dream in a married woman’s dream differ from that of an unmarried girl, due to many different things, represented by the details of life between them. Even the details that the dreamer says are based on What he sees in the dream and because of the difference between each of them is highlighted
